generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and traffic arrows, which is the main surface for vehicle movement.
- sidewalk: A pedestrian walkway is visible on the right side of the road, separated by a curb and lined with trees.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible along both sides of the street, including residential and commercial structures.
- vegetation: Several trees are present along the sidewalk and in front of the buildings.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: Pedestrians are visible on the sidewalk, including one person pushing a stroller and another walking on the far right.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road, including a black car on the left and a white car further ahead.
- bus: A white public transport bus is visible on the road, approaching the intersection.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible on a pole near the bus stop on the right side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including traffic light poles and sign poles.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on a pole near the intersection on the left side of the road.
